enDesc: Da'at Zekenim is a Torah commentary compiled from the writings of [French and German tosafists](https://www.sefaria.org/topics/tosafot?sort=Relevance&tab=sources) in the 12th and 13th centuries.
heDesc: פירוש לתורה שנלקט מכתבי בעלי התוספות.
